welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Duxbury! This charming coastal town is known for its picturesque beaches, quaint New England charm, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Duxbury has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Provincetown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Provincetown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.
